entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34 with temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34 with temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill minus 40 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
